name: Dimension Jumper (Jan)
description:
Dimension Jumper is a completely text-based game on both mobile and PC. If a word or phrase is blue, it’s either a link or a something you can change. If it’s in the middle of the text, it’s probably a thing about you or someone else you can change. You, the player, are traveling through multiple dimensions to search for your sister. You use a material called Sitynur, which can open portals to other worlds. However, you start with only a small shard, which creates unstable portals to who-knows-where. To find your sister, you need to find more of these pieces. The friends you make along the way help you along.

It's completely text based, with choices that shape your main character and affects their relationships. There's many characters spanning multiple worlds to befriend!

Features:

✧ Customize your character's pronouns (she/her, he/him, they/them, and neopronouns), hair (texture, color, and length), skin tone, eye color, height, and personality.

✧ Befriend over fifteen characters, from princesses to hunters to super-powered people.

✧ Explore six different worlds, each with a twist.

✧ Make choices that affect the course of the game.

This game is in development, with one chapter released at a time. Follow my tumblr blog for updates.
